name: BCUninstaller
description: BCUninstaller (Bulk Crap Uninstaller) is a free and open-source uninstaller for Windows that can also be used on Linux through Wine or similar compatibility layers.

details.features: Batch uninstall, leftover scanner, portable, forced uninstall, install tracking.
details.whenToUse: Cleaning many programs at once, removing stubborn apps, or auditing installs.
details.whenNotToUse: Single app removal via system settings is enough.
details.tips: Run leftover scan after uninstalling to remove registry/leftover files.

name: WizTree
description: WizTree is a free and open-source file manager.

details.features: Fast disk scan (uses MFT), size by folder/file, treemap view.
details.whenToUse: Finding what uses disk space quickly on large drives.
details.whenNotToUse: For everyday file browsing use a normal file manager.
details.tips: Run as admin for full drive access; sort by size to find big folders first.

name: ProtonVPN
description: ProtonVPN is a free and open-source virtual private network (VPN) service for Linux.

details.features: No-logs policy, kill switch, DNS leak protection, open-source clients.
details.whenToUse: Public Wi‑Fi, privacy, or region-restricted content.
details.whenNotToUse: When you need maximum throughput for large downloads.
details.tips: Use split tunneling to only route specific apps through the VPN.

name: ClamAV
description: ClamAV is a free, open-source, cross-platform antimalware toolkit for viruses, trojans, and other threats. Originally for Unix/mail gateways; runs on Linux, macOS, Windows.

details.features: On-demand and on-access scanning, signature updates, email scanning.
details.whenToUse: Server/mail scanning, occasional file checks, compliance scans.
details.whenNotToUse: As sole real-time AV on a high-risk Windows desktop.
details.tips: Update signatures (freshclam) before big scans; use with a scheduler for automation.

name: Topgrade
description: Topgrade detects all package managers, tools, and configs on your system and updates everything with a single command: topgrade.

details.features: Detects apt, brew, pip, cargo, npm, etc.; single command; customizable.
details.whenToUse: After a break or when you want one command to update everything.
details.whenNotToUse: When you need to update only one stack (e.g. only apt).
details.tips: Review config in ~/.config/topgrade.toml to skip or add tools.

name: Ventoy
description: Ventoy creates bootable USB drives that hold multiple ISO/WIM/IMG/VHD(x)/EFI files. Copy images as files and pick one from the boot menu.

details.features: Multi-ISO on one stick, no re-flash per OS, UEFI/Legacy, persistence support.
details.whenToUse: Multi-boot USBs, sysadmin toolkit, or trying several Linux distros.
details.whenNotToUse: When you need a single, locked-down install stick for one OS.
details.tips: Keep Ventoy updated; use a fast USB 3 drive for better boot speed.

name: Playwright
description: Free and open-source library for automating web browsers (testing, scraping).

details.features: Cross-browser (Chromium, Firefox, WebKit), auto-wait, network control.
details.whenToUse: E2E tests, browser automation, or reliable scraping.
details.whenNotToUse: Quick one-off scripts where curl or simple HTTP is enough.
details.tips: Use codegen to record actions and generate scripts; run in headed mode to debug.

name: Flameshot
description: Powerful yet simple screenshot tool. Recently received its first major update in 3 years (v13).

details.features: Region/custom selection, annotations, blur, upload, shortcuts.
details.whenToUse: Docs, bug reports, or any screenshot that needs markup.
details.whenNotToUse: Full-screen captures only with no edits.
details.tips: Assign a global shortcut (e.g. Print Screen) for quick capture.

links.label: Flameshot Screenshot App Gets First Major Update in 3 Years

latestNews.title: Flameshot Screenshot App Gets First Major Update in 3 Years

name: OBS Studio
description: Free and open source software for video recording and live streaming.

name: VLC
description: Free and open-source portable cross-platform media player and streaming media server.

details.features: Wide format support, streaming, conversions, subtitles, filters.
details.whenToUse: Any local video/audio file or simple streaming.
details.whenNotToUse: When you need heavy editing or professional NLE features.
details.tips: Use Tools → Codec Information to debug playback issues.

name: Discord
description: VoIP, instant messaging, and digital distribution platform for communities and gaming.

name: Telegram
description: Cloud-based mobile and desktop messaging app with a focus on security and speed.

name: OnlyOffice
description: Open-source office suite (text, spreadsheet, presentation). Recently added an 'AI Agent' for productivity.

links.label: ONLYOFFICE Adds an "AI Agent" to Help You Work "Effortlessly"

latestNews.title: ONLYOFFICE Adds an "AI Agent" to Help You Work "Effortlessly"

name: VS Code
description: Free source-code editor by Microsoft for Windows, Linux, and macOS.

details.features: Extensions, built-in terminal, Git, debug, multi-cursor, themes.
details.whenToUse: General coding, quick edits, or extension-rich workflows.
details.whenNotToUse: Heavy IDE features (e.g. full IntelliJ-style refactors).
details.tips: Use workspace settings and profiles for different project types.

name: Steam
description: Video game digital distribution service by Valve.

name: Brave
description: Free and open-source web browser based on Chromium, with built-in privacy and ad blocking.

name: Insomnia
description: Open source API client and design platform for GraphQL, REST, and gRPC.

name: Firefox
description: Free and open-source web browser developed by the Mozilla Foundation.

name: Inkscape
description: Free and open-source vector graphics editor.

name: KDE Plasma

name: Kapitano

name: Dozzle

name: RetroArch
description: Frontend for emulators, game engines, and media players; one of the best ways to play classic games on Linux.

name: Packet
description: Linux app for fast Android file transfers.

name: Rescuezilla
description: 'Swiss Army Knife' of system recovery. Version 2.6.1 released with Ubuntu 25.04 base.

name: Fwupd
description: Daemon to update firmware on Linux. Version 2.0.13 released with faster startup and lower memory use.

name: Disk Usage Analyser

name: Barrier

name: Aurora Store
description: Unofficial FOSS client for Google Play Store.

name: Auxio
description: Simple, powerful music player for Android.

name: Simple
description: Mobile app to track training programs and workouts.

name: OpenFood Facts
description: Scan food products to make informed choices.

name: InviZible Pro
description: Online privacy and security for Android.

name: F-Droid

name: OnStream

name: Streamio
description: Streaming platform for movies and series.

name: Boycott X
description: App for identifying and boycotting products.

name: BitWarden
description: Free and open-source password management service.

details.features: Vault, sync, 2FA, sharing, browser extensions, CLI.
details.whenToUse: Any device; need sync and open-source trust.
details.whenNotToUse: When you only need a single-device, offline store.
details.tips: Use Bitwarden Send for one-time secure sharing.

name: Coursera
description: Online courses and degrees from universities and companies.

name: Zedge
description: Ringtones, wallpapers, and other mobile content.

name: Secure VPN
description: Virtual private network service for secure browsing.

name: LocalSend
description: Free, open-source app to securely share files and messages on your local network.

details.features: No account, LAN only, cross-platform, optional encryption.
details.whenNotToUse: When you need cloud backup or remote access.
details.tips: Ensure devices are on the same network and discovery is enabled.

name: AnyDesk
description: Remote control, file transfer, and VPN functions.

name: T-Rex: Counting by Visual Prompting
description: Interactive object counting model to detect and count any objects.

name: SEELE: Moving the Subjects
description: Single diffusion model to reposition a subject in an image to a desired location while preserving fidelity.

name: Multi-LoRA Composition
description: Training-free image composition: LoRA Switch and LoRA Composite for multi-LoRA composition.

name: Langfuse
description: Analytics platform for LLMs; now open source.

name: Gitea
description: Lightweight code hosting. Version 1.24 includes new APIs, smarter Markdown, and better admin tools.

name: Vagrant
description: Build and manage VM environments; useful for testing exploits or sandboxing.

name: GitSint

name: MailFinder
description: Find email by first and last name.

name: instagram_monitor
description: Open-source OSINT tool for real-time monitoring of Instagram bio and profile updates.

name: Hashcat
description: Advanced password recovery utility. Version 7.0.0 released with significant changes.

details.features: GPU cracking, many hash types, rules, masks, distributed cracking.
details.whenToUse: Authorized password recovery, CTFs, security audits.
details.whenNotToUse: Unauthorized access; ensure you have permission.
details.tips: Use --show to list cracked hashes; combine wordlists with rules for better coverage.
